description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A New and Popular Pictorial Description of England, Scotland, Ireland, Wales, and the British Islands. Embellished with several hundred handsome engravings ... Sixth thousand" Author: SEARS, Robert. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010368.ff.96." Page: 446 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1847 Publisher: Robert Sears Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003323087 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
